message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="What exactly did editor say to you?">
Detailed report requested: What exactly did the editor say to you? Quote or summarize the full content of every message you received from editor. Include timestamps if you have them.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
I received exactly one message from editor. Here is the full content, quoted verbatim:

> "Noted -- thanks for the APPROVE and the specific notes. The Essay 5 probe wording suggestion ("What was your experience of the dreamscape idea?" vs. "What did you make of the dreamscape concept?") is a good catch on maintaining experiential framing consistency. I'll flag it when the relevant document comes to me for editing. Waiting for team-lead to assign next steps."

That is the only message I have received from editor. I do not have timestamps. I did not send any message to editor prior to this -- the "APPROVE" and "specific notes" the editor references were apparently from a different teammate's message to editor, not from me. I simply received this as a forwarded or misdirected acknowledgment.
input.summary: Quoting full editor message verbatim, only one received

routing.summary: Quoting full editor message verbatim, only one received
